column4: ok, for me, my grub is installed properly on hda but there is a wrong grub on hda4. can i remove it from hda4 without breaking the grub on hda?
it shouldent hurt anything with it beiong on hda4 if you are bootijng from hda
i think its removeable by very CAREFULL use of the 'dd' command..
but given the dangers of a dd typo.. If the system works. leave it on there
